page.title: 19 TRANSPORT
page.content: Most households in Sapperton have a car (49 out of 66) which is as just as well because the bus service is not very frequent. Three times each weekday a single decker bus comes through from Stroud to Cirencester at 2 hourly intervals and returns to Stroud at 10.30,12.30 and 14.30. 37 people did their weekly 'big-shop' in Cirencester, 2 went to Stroud and 6 older residents depended entirely on Pete Strange's Mobile Shop which visits the Village on Wednesdays and Saturdays.We could only question 45 people. 38 use their cars to leave the Village, 5 go on the bus and 2 have motor bikes.
